Protocols/BigJuJuMapLocationProtocol.htm.name: location
Protocols/BigJuJuMapLocationProtocol.htm.abstract: The location, associated with this data point.

Protocols/BigJuJuMapLocationProtocol.htm.name: name
Protocols/BigJuJuMapLocationProtocol.htm.abstract: A string, identifying this item, for use in displayed popovers.

Protocols/BigJuJuMapLocationProtocol.htm.name: handler
Protocols/BigJuJuMapLocationProtocol.htm.abstract: This is a handler that is provided by the implementation.

Protocols/BigJuJuMapLocationProtocol.htm.name: textColor
Protocols/BigJuJuMapLocationProtocol.htm.abstract: If provided (OPTIONAL, with default being nil), the text in the popover will be displayed in this color.

Protocols/BigJuJuMapLocationProtocol.htm.name: textFont
Protocols/BigJuJuMapLocationProtocol.htm.abstract: If provided (OPTIONAL, with default being nil), the text in the popover will be displayed in this font.

Protocols/BigJuJuMapLocationProtocol.htm.name: callHandler()
Protocols/BigJuJuMapLocationProtocol.htm.abstract: This simply calls the handler, in whatever way is implemented.

Protocols/BigJuJuMapLocationProtocol.htm.name: BigJuJuMapLocationProtocol
Protocols/BigJuJuMapLocationProtocol.htm.abstract: This is used to designate a location, with an attached data entity, and a handler callback.

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl05BigJuB.name: invalidContainingRegion
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl05BigJuB.abstract: This is just a way of saying “Bogus, dude.”

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl05BigJuB.name: invalidContainingMapRect
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl05BigJuB.abstract: This is just a way of saying “Bogus, dude.”

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl05BigJuB.name: containingCoordinateRegion
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl05BigJuB.abstract: Returns an MKCoordinateRegion that contains all points in the collection (with padding).

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl05BigJuB.name: containingMapRectDatelineAware
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl05BigJuB.abstract: Returns an MKMapRect that contains all points, choosing the shortest wrap across the dateline.

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl05BigJuB.name: coordinate
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl05BigJuB.abstract: Returns the arithmetic mean (center) of the coordinates.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController/Annotat.name: point(inside:with:)
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController/Annotat.abstract: This tests whether or not the given point fits inside the annotation.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController/Annotat.name: layoutSubviews()
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController/Annotat.abstract: Called to lay out the views. We use this to populate aggregate markers.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController/Annotat.name: didMoveToSuperview()
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController/Annotat.abstract: Called when the view is transitioned within the hierarchy.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController/Locatio.name: init(_:)
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController/Locatio.abstract: Initializer with an array of location data entities.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController/Locatio.name: init(_:)
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController/Locatio.abstract: Initializer with a single location data entity.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController/Locatio.name: LocationAnnotation
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController/Locatio.abstract: This is used to denote a single annotation item

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController/Annotat.name: AnnotationView
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController/Annotat.abstract: This is used to display a map marker.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/s.name: mapData
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/s.abstract: The data for the map to display.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.name: singleMarkerImage
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.abstract: The image to be used for markers, representing single locations. Default is the generic map marker (both single and aggregate)

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.name: multiMarkerImage
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.abstract: The image to be used for markers, representing aggregated locations. Default is the generic map marker (both single and aggregate)

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.name: displayNumbers
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.abstract: If true, multiple (aggregate) markers will display the number of elements aggregated. Default is true.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.name: stickyPopups
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.abstract: If true (default is false), then popovers will not dismiss, when an item is selected.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/s.name: mapView
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/s.abstract: The main view of this controller is a map. This simply casts that.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/s.name: region
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/s.abstract: This allows direct access to the displayed map region.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/s.name: visibleRect
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/s.abstract: This allows direct access to the displayed map rect.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.abstract: Called when the view hierarchy has completed loading, but before it is laid out and displayed.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.name: mapView(_:viewFor:)
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.abstract: Returns the appropriate marker view for an annotation.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.name: mapViewDidFinishRenderingMap(_:fullyRendered:)
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.abstract: Called when the map has finished rendering all its tiles. We use it to force the annotations to be recalculated.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.name: mapView(_:regionDidChangeAnimated:)
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.abstract: Called when the map has changed its region. We use it to force the annotations to be recalculated.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.name: mapView(_:didSelect:)
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.abstract: This is called when a marker is selected.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.name: mapView(_:didDeselect:)
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.abstract: This is called when a marker is deselected.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.name: gestureRecognizer(_:shouldReceive:)
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html#/c.abstract: Called to determine whether or not to consume a touch event.

Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html.name: BigJuJuMapViewController
Classes/BigJuJuMapViewController.html.abstract: This is the heart of this package.
